name: 하트리스(Heartless)
description:
The protagonist happened to be involved in an incident.
Will she be able to escape from the upcoming threats and survive?

[Heartless] is a single play action FPS game that follows the story.
Become the [Heartless] hero and enter the world now.

[Heartless] offers the following play:
Four or more types of guns action plays
Undercover assassination action play
A new story, and a new world

Caution: There are many shortcomings in the game, but please play it with a broad mind. Thank you.
